pageContext.claim: “There are other potential ways that I can [build the wall]. You saw what we did with the military, just coming in with the barbed wire and the fencing, and various other things.”
pageContext.analysis: There are not other ways Trump can build the wall. All appropriations need to be approved by Congress. The Armed Forces can provide indirect support on American soil. They can “share information collected during the normal course of military operations; loan equipment and facilities; provide expert advice and training; and maintain and operate equipment,” for example.
